author: Calvin Woodward
title: AP: Leaves trail of unmet promises...
description: AP: Leaves trail of unmet promises... (First column, 6th story, link ) Related stories: USA TODAY: Golf, handshakes and Mar-a-Lago conga line; Squandered week highlights President's lack of COVID-19 focus... Trump Congratulates Himself 116 Times for Response.…
content:
WASHINGTON (AP) For several months, President Donald Trump and his officials have cast a fog of promises meant to reassure a country in the throes of the coronavirus pandemic. Trump and his team havent delivered on critical ones.
They talk numbers. Bewilderi… [+12053 chars]
